member.name: ID3D12CommandAllocator.Reset
member.summary: Indicates to re-use the memory that is associated with the command allocator.
member.returns:
This method returns E_FAIL if there is an actively recording command list referencing the command allocator. The debug layer will also issue an error in this case.
See Direct3D 12 Return Codes for other possible return values.

member.name: ID3D12CommandAllocator
member.summary: Represents the allocations of storage for graphics processing unit (GPU) commands.
